actions.name: CloneReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a receipt rule set by cloning an existing one

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new configuration set

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to create a configuration set event destination

actions.name: CreateConfigurationSetTrackingOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to creates an association between a configuration set and a custom domain for open and click event tracking

actions.name: CreateCustomVerificationEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new custom verification email template

actions.name: CreateReceiptFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new IP address filter

actions.name: CreateReceiptRule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a receipt rule

actions.name: CreateReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create an empty receipt rule set

actions.name: CreateTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to creates an email template

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing configuration set

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an event destination

actions.name: DeleteConfigurationSetTrackingOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an association between a configuration set and a custom domain for open and click event tracking

actions.name: DeleteCustomVerificationEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing custom verification email template

actions.name: DeleteIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified identity

actions.name: DeleteIdentityPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified sending authorization policy for the given identity (an email address or a domain)

actions.name: DeleteReceiptFilter
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified IP address filter

actions.name: DeleteReceiptRule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified receipt rule

actions.name: DeleteReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified receipt rule set and all of the receipt rules it contains

actions.name: DeleteTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an email template

actions.name: DeleteVerifiedEmailAddress
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified email address from the list of verified addresses

actions.name: DescribeActiveReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to return the metadata and receipt rules for the receipt rule set that is currently active

actions.name: DescribeConfigurationSet
actions.description: Grants permission to return the details of the specified configuration set

actions.name: DescribeReceiptRule
actions.description: Grants permission to return the details of the specified receipt rule

actions.name: DescribeReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to return the details of the specified receipt rule set

actions.name: GetAccountSendingEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to return the email sending status of your account

actions.name: GetCustomVerificationEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to return the custom email verification template for the template name you specify

actions.name: GetIdentityDkimAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return the current status of Easy DKIM signing for an entity

actions.name: GetIdentityMailFromDomainAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return the custom MAIL FROM attributes for a list of identities (email addresses and/or domains)

actions.name: GetIdentityNotificationAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return a structure describing identity notification attributes for a list of verified identities (email addresses and/or domains),

actions.name: GetIdentityPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to return the requested sending authorization policies for the given identity (an email address or a domain)

actions.name: GetIdentityVerificationAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return the verification status and (for domain identities) the verification token for a list of identities

actions.name: GetSendQuota
actions.description: Grants permission to return the user's current sending limits

actions.name: GetSendStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to returns the user's sending statistics

actions.name: GetTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to return the template object, which includes the subject line, HTML par, and text part for the template you specify

actions.name: ListConfigurationSets
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the configuration sets for your account

actions.name: ListCustomVerificationEmailTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the existing custom verification email templates for your account

actions.name: ListIdentities
actions.description: Grants permission to list the email identities for your account

actions.name: ListIdentityPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the email templates for your account

actions.name: ListReceiptFilters
actions.description: Grants permission to list the IP address filters associated with your account

actions.name: ListReceiptRuleSets
actions.description: Grants permission to list the receipt rule sets that exist under your account

actions.name: ListTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list the email templates present in your account

actions.name: ListVerifiedEmailAddresses
actions.description: Grants permission to list all of the email addresses that have been verified in your account

actions.name: PutConfigurationSetDeliveryOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update the delivery options for a configuration set

actions.name: PutIdentityPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update a sending authorization policy for the specified identity (an email address or a domain)

actions.name: ReorderReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to reorder the receipt rules within a receipt rule set

actions.name: SendBounce
actions.description: Grants permission to generate and send a bounce message to the sender of an email you received through Amazon SES

actions.name: SendBulkTemplatedEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to compose an email message to multiple destinations

actions.name: SendCustomVerificationEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to add an email address to the list of identities and attempts to verify it for your account

actions.name: SendEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to send an email message

actions.name: SendRawEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to send an email message, with header and content specified by the client

actions.name: SendTemplatedEmail
actions.description: Grants permission to compose an email message using an email template

actions.name: SetActiveReceiptRuleSet
actions.description: Grants permission to set the specified receipt rule set as the active receipt rule set

actions.name: SetIdentityDkimEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable Easy DKIM signing of email sent from an identity

actions.name: SetIdentityFeedbackForwardingEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable whether Amazon SES forwards bounce and complaint notifications for an identity (an email address or a domain)

actions.name: SetIdentityHeadersInNotificationsEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to set whether Amazon SES includes the original email headers in the Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) notifications of a specified type for a given identity (an email address or a domain)

actions.name: SetIdentityMailFromDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the custom MAIL FROM domain setup for a verified identity

actions.name: SetIdentityNotificationTopic
actions.description: Grants permission to set an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic to use when delivering notifications for a verified identity

actions.name: SetReceiptRulePosition
actions.description: Grants permission to set the position of the specified receipt rule in the receipt rule set

actions.name: TestRenderTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a preview of the MIME content of an email when provided with a template and a set of replacement data

actions.name: UpdateAccountSendingEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable email sending for your account

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetEventDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to update the event destination of a configuration set

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetReputationMetricsEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable the publishing of reputation metrics for emails sent using a specific configuration set

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetSendingEnabled
actions.description: Grants permission  to enable or disable email sending for messages sent using a specific configuration set

actions.name: UpdateConfigurationSetTrackingOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an association between a configuration set and a custom domain for open and click event tracking

actions.name: UpdateCustomVerificationEmailTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing custom verification email template

actions.name: UpdateReceiptRule
actions.description: Grants permission to update a receipt rule

actions.name: UpdateTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update an email template

actions.name: VerifyDomainDkim
actions.description: Grants permission to return a set of DKIM tokens for a domain

actions.name: VerifyDomainIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to verify a domain

actions.name: VerifyEmailAddress
actions.description: Grants permission to verify an email address

actions.name: VerifyEmailIdentity
actions.description: Grants permission to verify an email identity
